>
[Silvertongue Mutagen](/Equipment.aspx?ID=101)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Elixir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=59" />
<trait label="Mutagen" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=116" />
<trait label="Polymorph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=127" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 550 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Your features become striking and your voice becomes musical and commanding, though facts and figures become hazy for you and emotion clouds your ability to reason.

 **Benefit** You gain an item bonus to [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5), [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6), [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7), and [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) checks. Your critical failures with any of these skills become failures instead.

 **Drawback** You take a –2 item penalty to [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4), [Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8), [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11), and [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) checks. Choose one skill in which you are trained; for the duration, you become untrained in that skill. All your failures on checks to [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26) become critical failures.
